ygData.subject: Re: are strength affecting spells worth it?
ygData.msgSnippet: enfeeblement does help but only for 10 seconds or so because i cast this on somethin really hard on me and he did like 2 damage max for about 10 seconds than
ygData.messageBody:
enfeeblement does help but only for 10 seconds or so
because i cast this on somethin really hard on me and
he did like 2 damage max for about 10 seconds than
back to normal.
The Wanderer

--- rival@... wrote:
> From: rival@...
>
> Does anyone know if spells like enfeeblement really
> help? If all they do is lower strength,
> that is pointless. I had an ogre once with 150str
> and he didn't do anymore damage than
> an elf with 50str. I would hate to be wasting mana
> just to make it so an orc could carry
> less before i kill him.
>
>
